it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Class FixedDistanceTargetCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.FixedDistanceTargetCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TargetCalculator

    public class FixedDistanceTargetCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TargetCalculator
    This class is a TargetCalculator that finds targets that is in a fixed range of moves away from the starting point
    Author:
    Adriana Ferrari

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Board board
      The Board on which distances are computed
      private Range range
      This property represents the range of moves away the target can be from the starting point

      This constructor sets the range of moves that will be used during computations
